name: Total Assault
description:
Total Assault is a leading full-service digital and social marketing agency with entertainment DNA.
Total Assault is more than that. We're an agency full of creative-minded-type-A-personalities with a passion for digital. We design and execute digital and social strategies based on experience, expertise and, sometimes, experimentation. Whatever we do, we want to take it one-step beyond. Our team provides big agency output with the individual attention that only a boutique can provide.
